name: Fiasco-mustache
tagline: A Fiasco Playset generator, with Mustache !
body:
## What is Fiasco-Mustache ?

"Fiasco-Mustache" is a project I made in order to easily produce playsets for [Fiasco](http://www.bullypulpitgames.com/games/fiasco/), the game by Bully Pulpit Game.

This project is a web-page, with no server-related code, so everyone can get a local copy and test it with any web-browser. The name comes from a distinct library used to generate the playset : Mustache.

## How to use Fiasco-Mustache ?

Download the zip file, unzip it, and double-click on generator.html. 

Then follow the instructions in the "About" tab.

## Licenses

Current version : 0.1 <2015-05-06>

"Fiasco-Mustache" is released under the CC-By-SA license, and is a Beerware.

"Fiasco-Mustache" uses the following library :
* [Mustache.js](https://github.com/janl/mustache.js/) for the template generation
* [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com/) for the css rendering
* [jQuery](http://jquery.com/) for the AJAX functions
* [FileSaver.js](https://github.com/eligrey/FileSaver.js/) for the file saving/loading
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
